```{r}
data <- read.csv("~/Desktop/Personal/Football ML/Football Data/Punt Data/PuntDataFinal.csv")
head(data)
```

##Splitting Data
```{r}
split <- sample.split(data$Efficiency, SplitRatio = 0.8)

train_reg <- data[split, ]
test_reg <- data[!split, ]

```


##Building Model

```{r}
logistic_model <- glm(Efficiency ~ PLocID + Snaptime + Distance + Practice + precipitation + Wind + Temp,
                      data = train_reg,
                      family = "binomial")

logistic_model
summary((logistic_model))
```
